ygData.subject: Re: Dex and channeling
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I will stand up here and get flamed / shouted at (actually flaming is good on this list ie not bad sooooo) DEX Definitely in my opinion no matter what GZ or
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I will stand up here and get flamed / shouted at (actually flaming is
good on this list ie not bad sooooo)

DEX Definitely in my opinion no matter what GZ or whoever says helps my
channeling and spell casting nooooo end ie makes it great.

I have a halfling druid with a very very high dex.. made that way for that
reason and I can honestly say that it woops my clerics reasonable dex into
the ground, and I am talkin tryin to snare a cyclops as was or a HG (as is
now) flat on my back faced away and pindin on me, it goes off on 4th try, 1
fail (interrupt) 2 savesd and one positive I rely on it whole heartedly and
ok channeling is high but so is dex about 135/145 dependin if rings on or
not.

I have experimented with characters same class (ie cleric) and lesser dex
and I get wopped on np spell , he not go off...

Agreed it hasd been publicised but for me up until last night I LOVE my high
dex....

But as always this post is made in the best possible taste and is open to
debate as is a good one and if is chewin over old cud well I said along time
ago it hasnt for a while and I still hold to me guns; sorry but when I saw
this one i had to reiterate what I know to be true for me; coincidence or
not..
